app.title: brew
settings.title: Settings
settings.appearance.color_theme.descript: Select your preferred color theme for Brew App.
settings.privacy.discord_rpc.description: Manages the Discord Rich Presence integration. Disabling this will cause 'brew' to no longer show up as a game or app you are using on your Discord profile.
settings.privacy.discord_rpc.note: Note: This will not prevent any instance-specific Discord Rich Presence integrations, such as those added by mods. (app restart required to take effect)
settings.appearance.titlebar_style.descr: Choose how the application window titlebar should look.
settings.appearance.titlebar.note: Note: Changing the titlebar style requires restarting the application.
settings.appearance.titlebar.restart_req: The application needs to be restarted to apply the titlebar style change.
